document_name_accent: mat can bang noi tiet to.json
document_title: Hormonal imbalance: Causes, symptoms and diagnosis
subsection_content:
Hormones are substances that coordinate many different functions in the body by transmitting messages through the blood to organs, skin, muscles, and tissues. Hormones play an important role in health with about 50 types of hormones in the human body.
Different endocrine glands make up the endocrine system. Hormones help control various functions in the body, including: metabolism, homeostasis, growth, development, sexual function, mood, reproduction, sleep cycles. (first)
subsection_title: mat can bang noi tiet to.json. What are hormones?
subsection_data:
